ygData.subject: Re: Glowing Stein Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: The Rodcent Nife fish is a rare spawn in the pool, has been there a while now.  I wonder what it drops for loot?  Most likely fish scales or something equally
ygData.messageBody:
The Rodcent Nife fish is a rare spawn in the pool, has been there a while
now. I wonder what it drops for loot? Most likely fish scales or something
equally good :p

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti

>From: Brian Dickens <briandickens@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Glowing Stein Quest
>Date: Wed, 15 Sep 1999 06:37:36 -0700 (PDT)
>
>From: Brian Dickens <briandickens@...>
>
>John Kim said:
>
>"They need to make an equivalent faction hit for looting the fish, or
>raise the level of the fish so you can't use a mule for it."
>
>--------------------
>
>It is my understanding that they changed the fish for this quest. It is
>just hearsay, but this is what someone told me...
>
>" It is now called the Stein of Moggok. I got my character who i used
>to kill the fish for the quest in qeynos to see if they changed it just
>for fun. This is what i found, the fish is now the god Rodcet Nife. Hit
>me for 244pts dam in one bite. Then proceeded to call me a puny
>mortal.Not sure if the fish can be killed anymore. Just my experience
>with it:)"
>
>I haven't tried it, so I don't know if it's true. But then again, I
>never tried it before. Maybe someone wants to find out?
>
>Mandibal
>Stuck at 15
>
>Eadilie
>Brandy new lvl 4 Enchantress
>
>(Cazic-Thule)
